data.text: Yahweh God, you who rescues me, all during each day I call out to you to help me,
Because I have no more strength,
I am like a corpse that has been abandoned;
It is as though you have thrown me into a deep, dark pit,
It seems like you are very angry with me,
You have caused my friends to ◄avoid/stay away from► me;
My eyes cannot see well because I cry very much.
You certainly do not [RHQ] perform miracles for dead people!
Corpses in the grave certainly do not tell about your faithfully loving us [RHQ],
No one in the deep dark pit ever sees the miracles that you perform [RHQ],
But as for me, Yahweh, I cry out to you to help me;
Yahweh, why do you reject me [RHQ]?
All the time since I was young, I have suffered and have often almost died;
I feel that you have crushed me because of your being angry with me;
I feel as though they surround me like a flood [SIM];
You have caused even my friends and others whom I love to avoid me,
